antoine@apache.org
text:
I have just taken a look at this patch. Looks like until now ftp chmod action did not hit directories. The documentation http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/ftp.html does not mention directories.

Not sure what to do about this with backward compatibility on mind.

creator: riasol.rob@gmail.com
text:
For me it is absence of that case in documentation. On   linux just if I hit chmod dddd /dir or chmod dddd /dir/file just making ... chmod. For me ant is unsuitable if I canit change chmod of directories. I think if could be possible precise directory in fileset it could be better backward safe. Now
<fileset>
<include name="/path/dir"/>...
make nothing

actually this is a duplicate of bug 36194 but I'll close it the other way around since there is more activity here.

We could add a filesonly attribute and make it default to true.
